about_the_game:
It's not about the size of your hammer; it's how you use it to pole-vault yourself through this fast-paced action-platformer! Your hammer will grow continuously, but the larger it gets, the further you can launch yourself. Try to beat your personal-best time by preserving your momentum and carefully timing the swings of your hammer.

Story

Cursed by an evil wizard's dying breath, your Magical Hammer is growing out of control! Use magical grindstones to shrink it back down to avoid being crushed by your own weapon. Flatten all enemies that stand in your way to escape the wizard's tower!

Features

  • Escape the Wizard’s Tower: Hammer your way through a short-and-sweet level-based campaign
  • Hit the Floor: Whack the ground to vault yourself through the environment at blistering speeds; then bunny-hop to preserve your pace!
  • Scale-Based Combat: Scale up your Hammer for devastating heavy attacks or keep it light-weight and unleash a flurry of blows!
  • Steam Leaderboards: Compare your fastest time against players from around the World

Hammer Hex also includes the following accessibility features
  • Adjustable Game Speed
  • Customizable Inputs
  • Font selection and UI scaling
  • High contrast UI & reduced distraction modes
